sentences.en: Benchmark one - year and deposit rates are now % and 25 % respectively.
sentences.cn: 目前该国 一年期 基准存贷款利率已经分别%和25%.

sentences.en: Bond yields are generally regarded as the benchmark mortgage rates.
sentences.cn: 国债收益率通常被视为抵押贷款利率的基准.

sentences.en: Both actual and benchmark returns including exchange difference for the period concerned.
sentences.cn: 实际与指标回报已包括有关期间的汇率变动.

sentences.en: Finally, the results of running a parallel benchmark program on the WADE system are given.
sentences.cn: 最后, 在WADE网格 系统上通过中间件软件运行了并行benchmark程序,获得了性能结果.

sentences.en: In BENCHMARK - II , Steigbigel said the results mirrored Cooper's trial.
sentences.cn: 基准 - 的试验结果反映了库伯临床试验结果.

sentences.en: It's a vehicle that delivers the well - known SRT credo of benchmark performance.
sentences.cn: 它是一种工具,提供了著名的基准性能污泥龄信条.

sentences.en: Pareto efficiency is the economist's benchmark of efficient performance for an economy.
sentences.cn: 帕累托效率是经济学家判断经济是否有效运行的标准.

sentences.en: So there seems to be little purpose for a benchmark program.
sentences.cn: 所以看起来基准测试软件好像用处很少.

sentences.en: That's the benchmark rate for millions of business and consumer loans.
sentences.cn: 这是基准利率以百万计的企业和消费者贷款.

sentences.en: The bank charges 20 % to 30 % above the benchmark rate non - mortgage microloans.
sentences.cn: 对于无抵押小额贷款,信用联社收取的利率比同期贷款基准利率高出20-30%.

sentences.en: The benchmark Shanghai composite index has risen 75 per cent this year.
sentences.cn: 中国基准指数上证综指今年上涨75%.

sentences.en: The new fast computer is now the benchmark in the computer industry.
sentences.cn: 这种新型快速计算机已经成为计算机工业的基准了.

sentences.en: The valuation becomes a benchmark against which to judge other prices.
sentences.cn: 这个估价成了判断其他价格的依据。

sentences.en: We promote teamwork and benchmark our performance with international standards.
sentences.cn: 西门子鼓励团队合作,在用国际标准衡量员工业绩的同时,努力在企业内部创造让员工充分发挥潜能的气氛.

sentences.en: Yield spreads against Germany, the euro zone's benchmark economy, could also widen.
sentences.cn: 相对于欧元区基准经济体德国的收益率利差也可能扩大.

sentences.en: Yuanpei Translation is a benchmark, a fresh ration and a leading concept!
sentences.cn: 元培是一根标杆! 元培是一缕风尚!元培更是一种理念!

trans.tran_cn: 基准，参照，标准检查程序，水准标
trans.tran_en: something that is used as a standard by which other things can be judged or measured

trans.tran_cn: 用基准问题测试（计算机系统等）
trans.tran_en: to use a company’s good performance as a standard by which to judge the performance of other companies of the same type
